mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, crew_id, notice_date, notice_content, notice_hits, crew_no FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, crew_id, to_char(notice_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') notice_date, notice_content, notice_hits, crew_no FROM (SELECT notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, crew_id, notice_date, notice_content, notice_hits, crew_no FROM notice_board ORDER BY notice_no desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endNo}) WHERE RN >=#{startNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board VALUES (notice_board_no_seq.nextval, #{notice_category}, #{notice_title}, #{crew_id}, sysdate, #{notice_content}, 0, null)
